clinical_study.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study of Cuprimine
clinical_study.official_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study of Cuprimine (MK-0172-001)

brief_summary.textblock: Cuprimine (penicillamine) was made available in the Philippines by the Sponsor under a Compassionate Special Permit issued by the Bureau of Food and Drugs. Physicians were able to request the drug for their patients from the Sponsor. A Clinical Study Report form was completed for each purchase of Cuprimine.
